mutants.code:
def reverse_sentence(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.strip()
    words = sentence.split()
    words = words[::+1]
    reversed_sentence = ' '.join(words)
    return reversed_sentence

def reverse_sentence(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.strip()
    words = sentence.split()
    words = words[::-1]
    reversed_sentence = ''.join(words)
    return reversed_sentence

    sentence = sentence.strip()
    words = sentence.split()
    words = words[::-2]
    reversed_sentence = ' '.join(words)
    return reversed_sentence

def reverse_sentence(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.strip()
    words = sentence.split()
    words = words[::--1]
    reversed_sentence = ' '.join(words)
    return reversed_sentence
